MELANIE 
So… let me moan. 
ARCHIVIST 
…I’m sorry to cause a fuss. 
MELANIE 
(Snorts) Bit late for that. 
MARTIN 
How did you know we were there? 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 189 – Peers 
 
25 
GEORGIE 
How could we not? The entire city knows you were there. 
MARTIN 
(Under his breath) Oh, yeah. 
MELANIE 
(Sarcastically) Everyone is so excited to see the Ceaseless Watcher’s special 
little boy. 
(Martin and Georgie giggle) 
ARCHIVIST 
Yes, well. 
GEORGIE 
Always did enjoy being the centre of things. 
(Martin and Melanie giggle) 
ARCHIVIST 
So, what’s next? 
MARTIN 
Well, I vote we catch up somewhere that’s maybe not quite so close to the 
sinister mega-tower. 
[Martin starts to move] 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 189 – Peers 
 
26 
GEORGIE 
Not so fast. Is it safe? If we take you to the others, is that going to put them in 
danger? 
MARTIN 
Um. Oh, er… 
ARCHIVIST 
No. No, I don’t think it will. 
MELANIE 
(Intensely) I’m going to hold you to that. 
GEORGIE 
…Fine. Come on then. 
MARTIN 
Oh, uh, uh, Melanie, do you need a hand or... 
MELANIE 
No. No, I’m fine. Somehow managed to keep my cane through all of this. 
[Melanie unfolds her mobility cane] 
MELANIE (CONT’D) 
And I know this part of the tunnels pretty well. Besides, do you even have a 
torch? 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 189 – Peers 
 
27 
MARTIN 
Oh, uh, no, not anymore, we ah, we lost it w— 
MELANIE 
(Sharply) Then I’m not the one with the problem. I’m told it gets pretty dark. 
[Footsteps head off along with cane taps] 
(The Archivist chuckles) 
GEORGIE 
Oh, and John? 
ARCHIVIST 
Yes? 
GEORGIE 
No tape recorders. 
ARCHIVIST 
Oh, right you are. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS
